snippet.title: Sonic Galactic SAGE 2020 Trailer
snippet.description:
Sonic Galactic is a brand new 2D Sonic experience inspired by Sonic titles from the 1990s. With 5 playable characters including a brand new face to the Sonic franchise, Galactic is a way past cool fangame that has lots to offer! Download it here: https://www.sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-galactic-sage-2020-showcase-demo.799/
Once the SAGE website is in a stable state, this description will be updated with the official SAGE link. Follow the creator @LilacChips on Twitter for more information if you're interested. We at Starteam from the bottom of our hearts hope you enjoy the game, as we poured so much passion and effort into it. Special thanks to RummySM and Saturn's Rings for putting this wonderful trailer together.

#SonicGalactic #SAGE2020 #BigTungus
